result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Marathon County Clerk of Circuit Court

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Forest Lambert

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: Amanda.
Case Called at 8:34 am. 
State appears by ADA Rory McGarry.  Defendant FAILS to appear.  Attorney Vanessa Avila appears on his behalf. 
VRCW. 

State wishes to CONTINUE warrant and FORFEIT bond;

COURT ORDERS >>
WARRANT CONTINUES & COURT enters Judgment in the amount of $500. 

All future dates to be removed from calendar. 

Adj: 8:35 am.
Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing on October 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.

3:06 PM 
Clerk: Micki. 

State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher for ADA Rory McGarry.  
Defendant does not appear. 

Date and time set for Hearing.  
ADA Brubacher requests warrant due to defendant's non appearance at PTC.
COURT notes notice was given for PTC.  
COURT authorizes $500.00 bench warrant.  

Date:
BFH - 11/18/22 at 9:00 a.m. Br. 3

ADJ:  3:08 p.m.
State appears by ADA Rory McGarry. Deft does NOT appear - Atty Vanessa Avila appears on deft's behalf. Matter referred to intake court to address nonappearance.

records.addlTxt:
Pre-trial conference on September 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Final pre-trial on October 24, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Jury status hearing on November 15, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury Trial on December 8, 2022 at 09:00 am.

No contact with victim(s): A.M.L.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (1) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk: Heather. 
Case called: 2:50 p.m. 

State appears by ADA Kerri Puig.  Defendant appears from MCJ via Zoom, with Atty Paige Metzman and Atty Krista Cannon, in person.

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 

PLEA: NOT GUILTY on CM's

COURT ORDERS: $500.00 signature bond.

CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s): A.M.L.
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 1 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

DATES:
PTC W/JA: 9/26/22 @ 1:30 p.m. 
FPT/TP: 10/24/22 @ 1:30 p.m.
JSH: 11/15/22 @ 9:00 a.m. 
JT: 12/8/22 @ 9:00 a.m.
